text: @BreitbartNews @realDonaldTrump Didn’t we all grow up believing that only countries like North Korea & Russia places like that NOT IN THE USA where the kind of countries that would use its Military on its own people or spread a BIO HAZARD like COVID-19 upon it’s people The Oath of Office was to protect NOT HARM
